``` {r, gapminder, echo=TRUE}
library(gapminder)
library(dplyr)
library(ggplot2)
#View(gapminder)
gapminder %>% 
  filter(year==2002) %>%
  pull(country,pop)

ggplot(gapminder, aes(x = pop)) +
  geom_histogram(fill = "blue")
```
